templateEditor.title: Template Editor

ChemSectionConfig.title: Molecules Section Configuration
ChemSectionConfig.explanation: This section provides a molecule viewer and a composer, both based on Kekule JS, wich allow the user to draw and display organic molecules.

FormSectionConfig.title: Form Section Configurarion
FormSectionConfig.explanation: This section adds a form composed by fields that can be completed with short strings of text or numbers. If a number field is selected, a unit can be asigned to it. This component is particularly suitable for the situation where a group of succint data needs to be recorded.

HeaderSectionConfig.title: Header section configuration
HeaderSectionConfig.explanation: This section shows a group of automatically generated data about the document.

JournalSectionConfig.title: Journal section configuration
JournalSectionConfig.explanation: This section provides a journal, based on the recording of short entries. It is ideal for the recording of experimental observations.

LinksBoxSectionConfig.title: Links Box section configuration
LinksBoxSectionConfig.explanation: This section allow users to add links to files that are stored in some cloud service. It is usefull to keep related files accesible from the document without having to actually attach them to it. It saves space and prevents having the same file stored in different places.

TableSectionConfig.title: Table Section Configuration
TableSectionConfig.explanation: This section provides a table, in wich the different categories of data are distributed in columns, while entries are added as rows. Columns can be composed of text or numbers. If you choose a number column, you can asing a unit to it.

TextSectionConfig.title: Text Section Configuration
TextSectionConfig.explanation: This sections provides a short plain text field. It is useful when the user has to enter a short text, not longer than a single paragraph.
